dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, one hundred fifty two countries? Seriously?

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, um, 152 countries co-authored a UN resolution.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Zheldibay, the resolution was co-authored by 152 countries and was adopted by consensus, marking a significant foreign policy achievement for Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For what, though? Like, another one of these things?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For what, though? Like, another one of these things?

dialogue_turns.text: It's for a new UN center, uh, for Sustainable Development Goals. In Almaty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's for a new U N center, uh, for Sustainable Development Goals. In Almaty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) has adopted a resolution to establish a regional UN center for Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) in Almaty, aimed at supporting Central Asia and Afghanistan.

dialogue_turns.text: SDGs. Right. More acronyms, more centers. Does it, like, actually do anything useful?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: SDGs. Right. More acronyms, more centers. Does it, like, actually do anything useful?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Kazakhstan's president, Tokayev, thinks it's a "significant foreign policy achievement."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For them, maybe. But, for, you know, the region?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For them, maybe. But, for, you know, the region?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a regional hub. For Central Asia and Afghanistan. To coordinate efforts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a regional hub. For Central Asia and Afghanistan. To coordinate efforts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) has adopted a resolution to establish a regional UN center for Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) in Almaty, aimed at supporting Central Asia and Afghanistan.

dialogue_turns.text: Another hub. We have so many hubs that, like, coordinate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Another hub. We have so many hubs that, like, coordinate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They already host over 20 UN agencies there. So, um, it's not starting from zero.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They already host over twenty U N agencies there. So, um, it's not starting from zero.

dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but "coordinating international efforts." Is that just code for more meetings?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but coordinating international efforts. Is that just code for more meetings?

dialogue_turns.text: It's supposed to be a "key platform." For, um, genuine impact, I guess. President Tokayev seems pretty keen on it.

dialogue_turns.text: Huh. 152 countries. That's still a lot of buy-in.
